taDuoc: Squalane, Medium chain triglycerides, Glyceryl trioctanoate, Acid stearic, Cetearyl alcohol và Ceteareth-20, Cetostearyl alcohol, Glyceryl monostearate, Hydrogenated lecithin, Dimethicone, Sorbitan monostearate, 1,3- Butylene glycol, Glycerin đậm đặc, Xanthan gum, Colloidal silicon dioxide. Methyl paraben, Propyl paraben, Natri edetate, Butylated hydroxytoluene, Natri metabisulfite, Hương táo, Nước tinh khiết
